## IToken.sign() method

Signs a payload to create a token with specified expiration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
sign(payload: Payload, options: SignTokenOptions): string;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

The data to be encoded in the token


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[SignTokenOptions](./auth.signtokenoptions.md)


</td><td>

Configuration options including expiration time


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

The signed token string
